div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 373 Olynthus, 1931 (763) Burial: 348 B.C. (Clement) Contents: c. 46 AR. Not from excavations Acanthus: 2 or 3 tetradr. Amphipolis: 1 tetradr. Chalcidian League: c. 43 tetradr. Disposition: dispersed Robinson-Clement, Olynthus IX, pp. 183-5, illus. (hd. IX) Ravel's record gives 3 Acanthus, 1 Amphipolis, 40+ Chalcidian League (35 photos and list of varieties on file in ANS) See no. 374 below
